posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 Cubs cards available.  These are all cards that I have recently upgraded and just don't have a need for them at this time.  If you would like back scans just PM or email me and I will send them to you.  All are priced with S&H included, prefer Paypal F/F for payment, but won't rule out trading.

All cards are Sweet Cap backs

Thanks for looking,

Steve   -  [url]steve@asmusherefords.com[/url]


Evers (Chicago on Shirt)  SC 350-460/30 (Card measures short, Crease) $OLD
